title: Rush to reach gold + (pref plat) in flex q
body:
Does anyone want to join me in flex q and try climb to plat?

I'm tired of queueing up as solo in flex q to verse a premade on the enemy team and getting stomped on.  {{sticker:sg-kiko}} 

My roles are Support and Support (support main)
Flex q rank : gold 3 

Add me if you're interested.

replies.body: I'm in a similar position, I added you for a chat :D

> [{quoted}](name=Fuzz,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=ljBIRg69,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-10-13T14:37:17.441+0000)
>
> I'm in a similar position, I added you for a chat :D

Added you back :D
